amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for Environmental Justice Small Grants issued by the Office of Environmental Justice.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 69 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit the use of funds for Environmental Justice Small Grants issued by the Office of Environmental Justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hice, Jody B. amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 240 (Roll no. 356).
